name: Ice Breaker
overview: ICE BREAKER Year 4003, the Earth is invaded by a terrible enemy: ice. Resources are dwindling, survival becomes increasingly difficult ... The only way to save the Earth from this situation is by bobsleighing through the huge area occupied by the terrible "Corvell", a sophisticated machine that has brought back the Earth to the Ice Age, until it reaches the only area where this terrible ice age has not yet reached.
